summary: This is an email chain from August 26-27, 2019, among FBI/NYPD task force members coordinating logistics for escorting victims to the Jeffrey Epstein court hearing at SDNY (Southern District of New York). It discusses meeting times, escorting victims away from press, and dress code requirements.

events.title: Epstein Court Hearing
events.description: A court hearing for Jeffrey Epstein case where victims were to be escorted to the courthouse with reserved seating, requiring coordination from FBI/NYPD task force.

locations: 290 (likely referring to 290 Broadway, FBI New York Field Office)
keyFacts: FBI/NYPD Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force was involved in escorting victims to Epstein's court hearing.
Victims were to be escorted "over the bridge" to the courthouse and had reserved seating.
Task force members were instructed to wear suits for the hearing per "higher ups" directive.
Coordination aimed to shield victims from press attention during their arrival.
